description_for_human: Your LifeOS Co-Pilot helps with daily life: save notes, set reminders, manage tasks, search your memory, and clean up old info. Optimized for voice and ADHD-friendly usage.
description_for_model: Plugin that enables users to manage personal tasks, notes, and reminders with natural language. Supports saving, retrieving, deleting memory items. Recognizes voice prompts, extracts time expressions, and stores per-user memory in a lightweight JSON backend. Use the /ask endpoint to route user input. Supports: 'remember', 'remind me', 'show my notes', 'delete reminder', 'forget everything', and more.
